oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words in the dialect of Stuurmansfontein, in the Kareebergen. (B XXIV. 2261; L II.-35. 3160-3164.) 1) See also A few words and names obtained from two Bushmen from Stuurman's and Thier Fontein, 2) This story is found in Book XXIV.
